00085 inline void ClassifierStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00086 {
00087     totalTime_ = 0.0;
00088 
00089     if ( classificationTime_.get() != 0 )
00090         totalTime_ += *classificationTime_;
00091 }

00093 inline void ClassifierStatistics::classificationTime (const double& elapsedTime)
00094 {
00095     classificationTime_.reset(new double(elapsedTime));
00096     updateTotalTime();
00097 }
